Since I'm assuming it will be translated for everyone, and not just broadcast in English, I would say this:

"This is the Voice of God.

You are all My children—equal, sacred, and beloved.

I did not create you to divide yourselves by color, creed, or coin. I did not gift you this world so you could poison it with hate or hoard its bounty while your brothers and sisters suffer.

End racism. End greed. Help each other. Love one another as I have loved you.

If you choose selfishness over compassion, cruelty over kindness, you will bring upon yourselves a sorrow no miracle will mend. The end will not be of My doing—but of your own hands.

You still have time.

Change now."

Kevin Smith - I went to a dinner at a friend's house and Kevin Smith was there. Got to hang out, smoke weed and talk comics with him. He's super smart and really funny.

Giancarlo Esposito - I met him at a Comic Con, and had at least 15 minutes just talking about his suits and hats (made by my friend John Penman.)

Danny Trejo - he came to my booth at a Comic Con and hung out for like 15 - 20 minutes talking with people and taking pictures.

Keith David - also at a Comic Con, he came by our booth, charmed everyone with his smooth-as-silk voice, and signed some stuff. Very nice, charming man.

I mean, those are the super big stars, but I've met Catherine Tate, Temuera Morrison, Emily Swallow, Jason Mewes, John Delancey, Brent Spiner, Dee Bradley Baker, and a while bunch of others. If you have the chance, go to Comic Cons!
